# Development Plan Template

Use this template as a starting point for gpt-5.2 when generating [`CodexWorkspace/docs/workspace/development.md`](https://github.com/OriAshkenazi/ai-pyrevit-developer-template/blob/main/CodexWorkspace/docs/workspace/development.md).

## Executive Summary (<= 150 words)
- Describe the project goal and scope.

## System Architecture
- Module breakdown and responsibilities.
- Key interfaces and data flows.

## gpt-5.2-codex Integration Strategy
- Task categories (backend, frontend, integration, infrastructure).
- How code tasks map to modules.

## Quality Assurance Framework
- Testing strategy and validation steps.
- Documentation update requirements.

## Implementation Milestones
- Milestone 1:
- Milestone 2:
- Milestone 3:

## Risk Assessment and Mitigation
- Risk:
- Mitigation:

## Deliverables JSON
```json
{
  "milestones": [],
  "artifacts": [],
  "validation": []
}
```
